long_description: Stay dry and comfortable in all conditions with the Patagonia Snowshot shell jacket, which delivers waterproof protection with a mountain-savvy design to keep you going, face shot after face shot. Two-layer construction boasts a polyester shell (with 50% recycled polyester content) backed with a waterproof, breathable laminate to deliver all-weather protection. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Polyester lining helps move sweat away from your body and glides smoothly over base layers; pit zips let you dump excess heat on the go. Adjustable, removable and helmet-compatible hood has a laminated visor for optimal visibility in bad conditions. Low-profile powder skirt can be integrated with compatible Patagonia pants for full protection in deep powder (pants sold separately). Zippered handwarmer pockets; one zip chest pocket with media cord routing; two internal drop-in pockets for goggles and gloves; one internal stash pocket. Adjustable cuffs and hem of the Patagonia Snowshot shell jacket can be cinched down to seal out cold weather; hem cords adjust from within pockets for easy adjustment.
